quote: A program that has not been tested does not work.
author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quote: If I like a program I must share it with other people who like it.
author: Richard Stallman

quote: UNIX is very simple, it just needs a genius to understand its simplicity.
author: Dennis Ritchie

quote: Wherever smart people work, doors are unlocked.
author: Steve Wozniak

quote: If you guys have ideas for things to do, let me know. I probably will ignore them.
author: Terry Davis

quote: Controlling complexity is the essence of computer programming.
author: Brian Kernighan

quote: You had to know what you were doing, and you had to know what you were talking about.
author: Jonathan Blow
